    • Method Detail

      • registerHighlightHandler

        public static void registerHighlightHandler(IHighlightHandler handler)
        Registers a new block highlight handler.

      • registerRenderContextHandler

        public static void registerRenderContextHandler(java.lang.String texture,
                                                int subid,
                                                IRenderContextHandler handler)
        Register a new render context handler. A render context is a block of rendering performed with similar OpenGL modes, for example, texture name.
        Parameters:
        texture - The name of the texture for this render context.
        subid - The subid of this render context. 0 is the default pass for normal rendering, higher subids render later. All subids of 0 will render before all subids of 1, etc.
        handler - The handler to register.

      • bindTexture

        public static void bindTexture(java.lang.String texture,
                               int subid)
        Bind a texture. This is used to bind a texture file when performing your own rendering, rather than using ITextureProvider. This variation is reserved for future expansion.

      • bindTexture

        public static void bindTexture(java.lang.String texture)
        Bind a texture. This is used to bind a texture file when performing your own rendering, rather than using ITextureProvider.

      • unbindTexture

        public static void unbindTexture()
        Unbind a texture. This binds the default texture, when you are finished performing custom rendering.

      • preloadTexture

        public static void preloadTexture(java.lang.String texture)
        Preload a texture. Textures must be preloaded before the first use, or they will cause visual anomalies.

      • renderBlock

        public static void renderBlock(RenderBlocks render,
                               Block block,
                               int X,
                               int Y,
                               int Z)
        Render a block. Render a block which may have a custom texture.
